features.html:
Iuvenes, mane surgite et ad urbem magna celeritate 

iter facite.

choicesHtml: The young men will rise early and will make the big journey from the city with great speed.
Young men, rise early to make the journey from the city as quickly as possible.
The young men rise early and make the journey with speed to the big city.
Young men, rise early and make the journey to the city with great speed.
